structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Police and firefighters' merit system may be established -- Law governing.
law.text: Any county may, by order of its fiscal court, duly made and entered of record, create a merit system for both the county police force and the county fire department, and for that purpose establish a single merit board for both. The board shall concurrently exercise the powers granted by KRS 67.323, 78.400 to 78.460 and 78.990.
